title: Isle of Mystery: Eyes of The King
description: Isle of Mystery is Book 2 in the debut, award-winning Salty Splashes Collectionâ„¢ of illustrated juvenile fiction for kids 4-12+: a refreshingly new slant on classic cartoon stories. Isle of Mystery finds the cartoon cast washed up on a seemingly deserted island, welcomed by an old and eerie No Trespassing sign. Excited by adventure, they bravely set out to explore the isle and try to find a place to camp before dark. On the way, they have comical encounters with a host of island denizens with spooky yellow eyes. Undaunted by these detours, they finally make a friend and discover the mystery of the Eyes of The King; but can they make camp before dark?
author: J.Z. Bingham
